Package com.landrycarroll.leaflog.infrastructure

package com.landrycarroll.leaflog.infrastructure
  • Related Packages

    com.landrycarroll.leaflog

  • Class
    Description
    ConsoleIO
    Uses the native Java Scanner, Files, and Paths utilities to implement the UserIO interface.
    DynamicDbInitializer
    DynamicDbInitializer is a custom Spring ApplicationContextInitializer that allows the user to input a dynamic path to an SQLite database at application startup.
    FrontendController
    Controller that forwards all non-API and non-static requests to the frontend's index.html.
    MenuBuilder
    MenuBuilder is a utility class for building and displaying a CLI-based menu.
    UserIO
    UserIO is an interface that defines an abstraction for input/output operations in the application.
